thing-type.label: RGBW Light
thing-type.description: A light that can change color, white temperature and brightness. Brightness may be changed even in white mode via a dimmer item on the color channel.

parameter.name: transitionTime
parameter.label: Transition Time
parameter.description: Time taken to fade from one state to another in seconds to 1 d.p. May be left blank to default. Minimum is 0, maximum is 6553.5 seconds.

parameter.name: transitionToOffTime
parameter.label: Transition To Off Time
parameter.description: Time taken to fade to off in seconds to 1 d.p. May be left blank to default. Minimum is 0, maximum is 6553.5 seconds.

parameter.name: increaseDecreaseStep
parameter.label: Step size for INCREASE/DECREASE commands
parameter.description: How much to step brightness or temperature percentage in response to an INCREASE or DECREASE command. Leave blank to use the default for the gateway.

parameter.name: whiteTemperatureMin
parameter.label: Minimum white temperature
parameter.description: Minimum white temperature in Kelvin supported by this device.

parameter.name: whiteTemperatureMax
parameter.label: Maximum white temperature
parameter.description: Maximum white temperature in Kelvin supported by this device.
